content:
we need to implement distress thermometer export in FHIR,
https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6750919/
will questionnaire or problems be a better way to translate this?
this seems similar to a project we had: the questionnaire captures the data entry, the outcome (distress level) is an observation.
thanks, that helps a lot. so, the distress level itself is a observation, and the issues would be answers to questions of particular sections, will try this out
